sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that 
\[
	\frac{k }{p } = \frac{l }{q } = \frac{m }{r }
\]
Then show that 
\[
	\left(\frac{p ^2 k ^2 + q ^2 l ^2 + r ^2 m ^2}{p ^3 k + q ^3 l + r ^3 m }\right)^{3/2} = \sqrt{\frac{klm }{pqr }}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
It is given that 
\[
	\frac{k }{p } = \frac{l }{q } = \frac{m }{r } = s \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow k = \input[s1v1]{}s , l = qs , m = \input[s1v2]{}s 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, left hand side of the equation can be written as 
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \left(\frac{\input[s2v1]{} ^2 k ^2 + \input[s2v2]{} ^2 l ^2 + r ^2 m ^2}{p ^3 k + q ^3 l + r ^3 m }\right)^{3/2}
\]
\[
	\left(\frac{p ^2 s ^2 p ^2 + q ^2 s ^2 q ^2 + r ^2 s ^2 r ^2}{p ^3 sp + q ^3 sq + r ^3 sr }\right)^{3/2}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \left(\frac{s ^2 (p ^4 + \input[s3v1]{} ^4 + r ^4)}{s (p ^4 + q ^4 + r ^4)}\right)^{3/2}
\]
\[
	= 	\input[s3v2]{} ^{3/2}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, right hand side of the equation can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \sqrt{\frac{klm }{pqr }}
\]
\[
	= \sqrt{\frac{sp . s\input[s4v1]{} . sr }{pqr }}
\]
\[
	= \input[s4v2]{} ^{3/2}
\]
"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions, we can see that
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["p", "r"], "text": "$$\text{{After assumption \frac{k }{p } = \frac{l }{q } = \frac{m }{r } = s and taking terms separately we get $k = ps , l = qs , m = rs $}$$"}, {"data": ["p", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking LHS, and substituting the value of $k$, $l$, and $m$, in the LHS we get $\left(\frac{p ^2 s ^2 p ^2 + q ^2 s ^2 q ^2 + r ^2 s ^2 r ^2}{p ^3 sp + q ^3 sq + r ^3 sr }\right)^{3/2}$}$$}"}, {"data": ["q", "s"], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $\left(\frac{s ^2 (p ^4 + q ^4 + r ^4)}{s (p ^4 + q ^4 + r ^4)}\right)^{3/2}= 	s ^{3/2}$}$$"}, {"data": ["q", "s"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking RHS, and substituting the value of $k$, $l$, and $m$, in the RHS we get $\sqrt{\frac{sp . sq . sr }{pqr }}= s ^{3/2}}$}"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
